game.name: eFootball™
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: 합계 9억 다운로드를 돌파한 열광적인 축구의 세계가 여기에! 현역 스타 선수, 레전드 선수와 함께 전 세계의 플레이어가 당신을 기다리고 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step up and experience the exhilarating soccer game that has now surpassed 900 million downloads! The stars of today, legends of the past, and fellow users from around the world are all waiting for you!

reviewHighlights.text: we want the old PES back!!! bring back the master league and edit mode! we dont want your stupid pay to win "free" game
The AI ​​in this game (especially in the latest update) "$%$##" you in a very unfair way. We know they want you to play online, but if it's only meant...
